title: Undoing
alt: I've been sneaking out at night and installing lamps on the underside of every photovoltaic panel I can find. Sure, there are upwards of 80% losses, but I prefer to think of them as nearly 20% gains.
transcript:
[Caption above the panel:]
My Hobby:[A large wind turbine is spinning but the electric cord has been severed and rewired to a large fan.][Caption below the panel:]
Undoing
